label: 半済
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Literally, half-payment." One-half of the tax rice (nengu) that vassals of the Ashikaga bakufu were permitted to collect from shōen and kokugaryō on a temporary basis. Originally yearly grants, they became permanent over time.　[年貢、足利幕府、荘園、国衙領]　"
